TEXT.TITLE: PHILIPPINE COCONUT PRODUCT EXPORTS FALL IN JANUARY
TEXT.BODY: Coconut product exports fell to 163,924 copra tonnes in January from 196,610 tonnes in December and 167,747 tonnes in January last year, government figures show. Coconut product sales earned 44.54 mln dlrs compared with 45.30 mln in December and 49.09 mln a year earlier. REUTER
